contrib packages¶

Some Yepes’s tools need to include models, template tags, or views. Those tools live in yepes/contrib and this document gives a rundown of them.

Note

For most of these add-ons you’ll need to add the package name (e.g., 'yepes.contrib.datamigrations') to your INSTALLED_APPS setting and re-run manage.py migrate.

  • Data Migrations

datamigrations¶

Some tools to efficiently export and import your data. For more information, see the Introduction to Data Migrations and the datamigrations documentation.
